page.title: 15WEST OGWELL
page.content:
{West Ogwell}is a little hamlet in South Devon near Newton Abbot.It has a little old church which has now been retired.Next to the church is convent,which used to be the manor, built in the 15th century by a man called{Thomas Reynell.}The convent is now used by the Nuns as a rest home for their old Sisters. I sometimes visit them because they are very nice to speak to. West Ogwell is a very pretty little village.In West Ogwell there are no shops,no telephones boxes or bus stops.There are a few isolated farms and houses.One is a dairy farm and{Valley Farm,}where I live, is a poultry and goat farm.In the old days my home used to be the Parsonage.
Lizzy Sheppard age 11\
